```{sql connection=db}
SELECT ac.carrier, ac.name, af.year, avg(af.dep_delay) as average_delay_min, af.day, af.month
FROM carriers ac
JOIN flights af
on ac.carrier = af.carrier
WHERE af.year >= 2016 and ac.carrier in ("AS", "DL", "F9", "AA" "NK", "B6","HA") and af.month=12 and af.day=25
GROUP BY ac.carrier

```
